detail_desc: Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side, and one side in a solid colour with a small appliqué on the brim. Width of brim 5 cm.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with spherical pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a raised spot pattern, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Romper suit in patterned slub cotton jersey with buttons at the top and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in waffled jersey with ribbed cuffs.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned viscose with lacing at the top and long, wide sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg. Short sleeves and short legs.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Metal and plastic hair clips in various sizes and designs decorated with polished stones and pearly plastic beads. Length 6-8 cm.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the top.
Base layer tights in soft wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton poplin with long puff sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Frill trim around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.

Thin jacket in soft cotton twill with a detachable hood and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, yoke with a pleat at the back and patch pockets with appliqués and a glittery print. Elasticated cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Wrapover top in jersey with a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with flounced cuffs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Textile marker that allows you to decorate your fabric odds and ends and give them a unique and personal design. Add some style to your canvas trainers, fabric bag or T-shirt. Available in several colours. How to use: 1. Let the marker do the work and allow your creativity to flow. 2. Leave the ink to set for at least 24 hours so that it is totally fixed and wash-proof. 3. Can’t wait for 24 hours? Iron it.
Top in soft, gently draping silk with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the back and slits in the sides. Lined at the top.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Height of soles 4.5 cm. Heel 5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Knee-length satin wrap dress with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the front. Adjustable spaghetti straps and a seam at the waist with a flared, asymmetric skirt. Lined at the top.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs reversible sequin side stripes.
Slippers in a soft knit with appliqués and embroidery. Pile linings and insoles. Soles with anti-slip protectors.
Chino shorts in an airy cotton weave with an extended waistband with a button and a zip fly. Adjustable tab with a button at the sides, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in soft imitation leather. High waist with a double-layered waistband, and a concealed zip and press-studs at one side. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Double-breasted pea coat in a sturdy weave with side pockets, a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs, and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Cotton twill shoes with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets. Relaxed fit with tapered legs that have shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Ankle-length pleated trousers in a woven fabric with a glittery finish. Loose-fit with velvet-covered elastic at the waist and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in tie belt at the waist and long balloon sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long puff sleeves and trim at the cuffs.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Short lace dress with a concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets with decorative seams, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Wide top in crêpe slub jersey with a lined drawstring hood, wide, raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Loafers in soft imitation leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.

Wide, calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and a small opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Blouse in a textured weave with covered buttons at the back of the neck, and long, voluminous puff sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in striped cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Calf-length, A-line dress in an airy weave. V-neck with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulder straps, and covered elastication at the top of the back. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, and text print on the front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with one large zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. One zipped inner compartment into which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap for when the bag is folded up. Size 5x18x32 cm. Size when folded up 3x11.5x15.5 cm.
Long jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, decorative details on the sleeves, a rounded hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Ankle-length treggings in washed stretch twill with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and seams on the legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.

Short, voluminous, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton blend with a gathered frill trim and narrow elastication at the top that continues over the arms. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps long, voluminous balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with fake buttons. Lined.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, high stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with press-studs. Lined.

Set with a sleeveless dress and sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Dress with decorative knot details at the top, buttons at the back, a seam at the top, flared skirt and sewn-in bodysuit. Lined sun hat with ties.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a deep V-neck, wrapover front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton and silk jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
